column5: Beautiful 1,800 SQ FT 3 bedroom/ 2 bath/ 2 car garage, conveniently located minutes from downtown Dallas. Close to Six flags, both airports, malls, lots of eateries, Potters House, Texas Rangers and about 13 miles from Cowboy stadium. A formal living /dining room; the family room has a log burning fireplace, and opens up to a beautiful covered deck. Community park within walking distance. House is fully furnished, stocked with towels, sheets pots and pans plus a full size washer and dryer.
